Monad

TODO. Meanwhile you can find a short description in the intro to typeclasses.

Data Types

The following data types in Arrow provide instances that adhere to the Monad type class.

  • Kleisli
  • NonEmptyList
  • Option
  • OptionT
  • SequenceK
  • State
  • StateT
  • Try
  • Either
  • EitherT
  • Eval
  • Id
